name: LocalMN Interactive
description:
LocalMN started as just an idea in 2001 at Paul at his sis and brother-in law’s house in Rochester with the mindset that someday, people will want to “search online” then “buy offline”. It seemed crazy to most at the time. Really crazy.
Today, we team with the “best of the best” local, digital web Minnesota  community for your project needs whether it’s web development, marketing or maps photography, all while doing our best to be sustainable.
